alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Alamosa, eastern Rio Grande, south central Saguache, northwestern Costilla and northeastern Conejos Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near La Garita to 6 miles east of Monte Vista to near Sanford. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alamosa, Monte Vista, Center, Del Norte, Sanford, La Jara, Blanca, Hooper, Capulin, Alamosa East, San Luis Lake, Mosca, Great Sand Dunes and Bountiful. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
